SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you almost lost control of your bladder or had an accident?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BLCS - Almost Lost Control of Your Bladder

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you altered your activities because of bladder problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BLCS - Altered Activities Because Bladder Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how much have bladder problems restricted your overall lifestyle?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BLCS - Bladder Problems Restrict Overall Lifestyle

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you lost control of your bladder or had an accident?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BLCS - Lost Control of Your Bladder
